oai_dc:dc.dc:title: O & W Track Inspector Car
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photo of O & W Track Inspector Car operated by a Singal Maintainer, Francis 'Gus' Kervin of Clinton, NY from 1950 - 1956. The car had a wooden body and was powered by a 5 HP 2 cycle Fairmount engine, of Minnesota. Gus added the seat and battery operated wiper. Picture was taken by Gus on a side track in Hamilton, NY.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Kervin, Francis
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Railroad; Railroad cars
Transportation
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Photograph; b&w; 10 1/2 x 8 1/4 in. (26 3/4 x 21 cm.)
